name: MirrorImage
description:
This is a simple but fun dodge game with a small twist.  Your knight character and his reflection have to dodge all of the monsters that are coming right at him!!  The Goblins will appear on both sides while the Vampire only appears on the right side and the Ghost will only appear on the left side (mirror side).  

You can use the WASD or Arrow keys to move your player to avoid the monsters.  You will earn points for every wave of monsters that you avoid.

I would like to thank Matthew Palaje for creating this game jam.  This is my first attempt at a computer game.  I have tried multiple one in the past but never finished one.  I can say this one is done.  Besides the music, I created all of the assets so please excuse the art.  :P  I am no artist.  I would like to do a shout out for Kevin.  His music is great.  His info is in the credits to learn more.

Please let me know if you have any questions or comments below.  Please enjoy the game.  :)
